data.message: I have been trying to reach you guys for two days. My real account was compromised and so was my email I used to get into that account, I had to make a second account to report my personal account and now my personal account was disabled. There seems to be no way for me to get my personal pictures back now. I keep getting redirected to the help center, but it doesnt give me any answers. I even messeged you directly and havent had anyone respond to me. All I want is to get my account back, but I have no way of getting into the account or email I used for facebook. Please help me. I sent in my id but I have no idea how you will reach me if I cant get into the email for the account. So far the customer service for facebook is the worst I've ever seen. Help me change my opinion and help me get my account back.

replies.message: Hi Sarah. If your account was taken over by someone else, please secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. You can learn how to recover an account you can't log into from our Help Center here: http://bit.ly/2hbQuZZ. Additionally, you can learn more about disabled accounts and how to make an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2iCxMy8. -James
I can't secure an account that is disabled? I also can't login to my account because if I send an appeal to remove my account from being disabled it send the email to my email that was compromised.
See Facebook will reply to everyone but me. This just made my point.
Me too may real accnt is disabled i try many time to send my valid id but no one response me..huhu
